pageProps.content:
# Peanut Satay

~1 cups 
serves 2

## Ingredients

* 2Tb peanut butter (sanitarium)
* 1tsp fish sauce
* 1Tb white sugar
* 1/4tsp garlic powder
* 1/4tsp ginger powder
* 1/2 cup water
* 1/2 cup milk
* 1/4 cup hoisin sauce
* 3tsp cornstarch

## Method


## Notes

Chicken or beef
